para.text: // The SWITCH statement is a replacement for the DO CASE statement

text.style: font-family:Consolas; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:italic; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#008000; background-color:#ffffff; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: // The biggest difference is that the expression (in this case sDeveloper) is only evaluated once.

para.text: // which will have a performance benefit over the DO CASE statement
